content: the minimalist cotton tee is a drop sleeve cropped t-shirt with a large neck boat i designed it based on my favorite t-shirts that i like to wear with high-rise skirts or jeans it is an easy pattern for beginners or any knitter that wants to knit a project while watching netflix or talking to friends it is knitted with the cotton by we are knitters but you can knit with whatever dk yarn that you have note that this pattern wasn t tested on other sizes so right now i cannot tell you exactly how much yarn you will need for the size s/m i used around 3 balls 100g and 212m each size guide the minimalist cotton tee is available in sizes xs s s/m m l xl 2xl 3xl 4xl 5xl and it is intended to be worn with approx 10 cm ease 10 cm larger than your bust measurement the measurements below are for the finished garment obs iaddedanextrasizetotheonesyouusuallyseeonpatterns s/m becausei malwaysbetween s and m and i find it frustrating so i decided tomake my tee based on my body too needles 3 5 mm and 4 mm circular needles i knit most of my projects with 80cm cables and i use the magic loop technique for smaller circumferences e g sleeves you can do the same or use different cable sizes if you prefer gauge 17 5 stitches and 25 row in a 10 cm square stockinette stitch with the 4 mm needles instructions with the 3 5 mm needles cast on 148 164 172 184 200 216 236 252 272 288 stitches using your favorite cast-on method i like to use the italian cast on for a neat edge place a stitch marker and join to work in the round pay attention not to twist the stitches work 6 row of rib k1 p1 or until your work measures around 2 cm from the cast on obs if you decided to use the italian cast on it counts as a row of rib so you can knit only 5 row after joining to work in the round change to the 4 mm needles and work in the round for 56 60 60 66 70 76 80 86 90 96 row or until your work measures around 24 26 26 28 30 32 34 36 38 40 cm from the cast on knit across the front stitches 74 82 86 92 100 108 118 126 136 144 and put them on hold you can just transfer them to a strand of waste yarn now you will work flat the back of the tee back work straight for 49 49 51 53 55 61 67 71 77 79 row or until your work measures around 19 19 20 20 22 24 26 28 30 32 from the point where you divided the back and the front finish with a ws row now you will separate the shoulders and
